New Records: Jazz Chisholm Jr became only the second player since 1900 to both hit a grand slam and steal three bases in a single game.
Matt Olson hit his major league-leading 52nd homer and overtook Andruw Jones as Atlanta's single-season home run leader.
Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr hit a grand slam in the bottom of the eighth inning to secure the win for the Miami Marlins.
Jake Burger hit a go-ahead two-run homer for the Marlins.
Luis Arraez and Yuli Gurriel also hit home runs for the Marlins.
Ozzie Albies hit his 30th homer of the season for the Braves.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Miami Marlins became the first NL East team to win a series against the division champions, the Atlanta Braves, who were 11-0-1 in their previous series against division opponents.
Braves star outfielder Ronald Acuna Jr. did not play due to right calf tightness.
